name: Monstrous Default
description:
(CW: Negative/critical feelings toward oneself.)

You feel bad.  Sometimes other people call you monster.  Is it okay to be a monster?  You feel bad and clunky.  Reach the goal.

Stumble and shamble your way toward your goal as you try to understand your monstrous form.  Each playthrough provides a new set of randomly mapped controls for your many joints!

---------

This game was made for the ROTTEN! Game Jam.  It is meant to be an intentionally bad game and was made in under 12 hours.  Enjoy!

-------

As per usual, I have not tested this game on a Mac, so please DO NOT pay money for the Mac version until after you have tried it.
